titleStmt.title: Most true and more admirable newes expressing the miraculous preseruation of a young maiden of the towne of Glabbich in the dukedome of Gulische, and the strange yet worthy excecution of Iohn Honaver of Brunholf at Wittenberg, this present yeere 1597.
titleStmt.author: Gurth, Alexander.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Adam Islip for Thomas Stirrop, dwelling in Pouls Church-yard at the signe of the George,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
